hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.
